HeroSection.mainTitle: Transforming Concepts into Seamless User Experiences
HeroSection.paragraph: Hi, I'am Ahmed Mangood, a Next.js Developer based in Riyadh.

GridSection.computerCardText: I prioritize client collaboration, fostering open communication
GridSection.globalCardText: I'm very flexible with time zone communications
GridSection.insideScoopCardbigText: Currently building a JS Animation library
GridSection.TechCardText: Tech enthusiast with a passion for development.
GridSection.emailCardText: Do you want to start a project together?

RecentProjects.projectOneDescription: Explore the wonders of our solar system with this captivating 3D simulation of the planets using Three.js.
RecentProjects.projectTwoDescription: Simplify your video conferencing experience with Yoom. Seamlessly connect with colleagues and friends.
RecentProjects.projectThreeDescription: A REAL Software-as-a-Service app with AI features and a payments and credits system using the latest tech stack.
RecentProjects.projectFourDescription: Recreated the Apple iPhone 15 Pro website, combining GSAP animations and Three.js 3D effects..

Clients.clientQuoteOne: Collaborating with Ahmed was an absolute pleasure. His professionalism, promptness, and dedication to delivering exceptional results were evident throughout our project. Ahmed's enthusiasm for every facet of development truly stands out. If you're seeking to elevate your website and elevate your brand, Ahmed is the ideal partner.

Experience.expOneDescription: Assisted in the development of a web-based platform using React.js, enhancing interactivity.
Experience.expTwoDescription: Designed and developed mobile app for both iOS & Android platforms using React Native.
Experience.expThreeDescription: Led the dev of a mobile app for a client, from initial concept to deployment on app stores.
Experience.expFourDescription: Developed and maintained user-facing features using modern frontend technologies.

MyApproach.approachOneDescription: We'll collaborate to map out your website's goals, target audience, and key functionalities. We'll discuss things like site structure, navigation, and content requirements.
MyApproach.approachTwoDescription: Once we agree on the plan, I cue my lofi playlist and dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.
MyApproach.approachThreeDescription: This is where the magic happens! Based on the approved design, I'll translate everything into functional code, building your website from the ground up.

Footer.mainTitleOne: Ready to take your digital presence to
Footer.mainParagraph: Reach out to me today and let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.
